explains: adv. 不可能地；难以置信地；无法可想地

sentences.en: In midsummer every Cape Cod town is impossibly crowded.
sentences.cn: 仲夏时节，鳕鱼角的每个镇都出奇地拥挤。

sentences.en: Mathematical physics is an almost impossibly difficult subject.
sentences.cn: 数学物理学是一门难得难以想像的学科。

sentences.en: The Endara government inherited an impossibly difficult situation from its predecessors.
sentences.cn: 恩达拉政府从其前任手里接过了一个极为困难的局面。
